subject: Coaches and Managers
Basketball
lead_paragraph: SACRAMENTO, Dec. 2 (AP) — Kevin Martin praised his former coach Rick Adelman before Saturday night’s game, then went out and helped spoil Adelman’s return to Sacramento.
snippet: SACRAMENTO, Dec. 2 (AP) — Kevin Martin praised his former coach Rick Adelman before Saturday night’s game, then went out and helped spoil Adelman’s return to Sacramento.
